thread.title: Jury awards $750,000 to black worker for racist incidents at Daimler Trucks
thread.title_full: Jury awards $750,000 to black worker for racist incidents at Daimler Trucks

author: Aimee Green | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Jury awards $750,000 to black worker for racist incidents at Daimler Trucks
text: A 12-person jury on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017, awarded Victor Pierce $750,000 -- finding that a noose, a swastika etching and other incidents created a racially hostile work environment for Pierce, who is African American.
